landingMain.deskripsi1: PT. Ghalaya Abadipersada Line is a private company engaged in shipping of mining resources and has been trusted by various well-known companies since 1992.

VisiMisi.descVisi: Making PT. GHALAYA ABADI PERSADA LINE as the best and most trusted shipping and sea transportation company.
VisiMisi.descMission: Always provide a high-quality solutions in the field of Shipping and Navy effectively and efficiently

Layanan.header: We serve the transportation of goods via shipping lines in Indonesia

Sertifikasi.desc: PT. Ghalaya Abadipersada Line always try to provide our best service. This is proven through our possession of multiple ISO certification

contactUs.desc: If you have any questions, criticism, feedback or are interested in our services, please feel free to contact us.
